name: The House on the Left
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Up Arrow - Enter Door

"You must spend a night in the spookiest of places, The House on the Left! You must get past every ghost, goblin and ghoul or it's good night. Will you survive in this platformer of sheer peril? Eating a booger salad sounds like an easier request. Be afraid, be very afraid as insidious monsters want you to never leave The House on The Left. Won't you come over?"

-'The House On The Left' Famicase Entry

Developer: Kyle Nyland

Created for: A Game By Its Cover 2016

Cartridge Art: Andrew Gallardo, Jonathan Bilski
